sentences.en: After him were working the priests, the men of the lowland.
But lowland species with no mountains nearby, such as those in the vast Amazon and Congo basins, will have nowhere to go.
sentences.cn: 但是那些生活在无山区域的低地物种，例如那些生活在广阔的亚马逊和刚果流域的物种，将会无处可逃。

sentences.en: Dikes protected the lowland from incursions of the sea.
sentences.cn: 堤防保护低地免于海水流入.

sentences.en: Habitat and Ecology: In lowland broad - leaved evergreen forest. Flowering: Aug.
sentences.cn: 生境与生态: 攀援于低海拔常绿阔叶林的乔木或灌木上. 花期: 8月.

sentences.en: Habitat and Ecology: In lowland forests attached to rocks or tree trunks.
sentences.cn: 生境与生态:生于林中岩石上或树干上. 花期: 4-5月.

sentences.en: Habitat and Ecology: In lowland thick forest and on wet places. Flowering: Apr. - Jun.
sentences.cn: 生境与生态: 生于低海拔密林下荫蔽湿润的地方. 花期: 4-6月.

sentences.en: Having enjoyed the rides at the Headland, visitors can take the shuttle to the Lowland.
sentences.cn: 游客在高地车乘以后,可以坐穿梭车去低地.

sentences.en: Highland Lowland is a carpet and a coffee table in one.
sentences.cn: “高原谷地”将地毯和咖啡桌合二为一.
我喜欢苏格兰低地的风景.

sentences.en: In the below video segment from the television series  "Life," you can see western lowland gorillas at a site in the Congo Basin.
sentences.cn: 在下面来自电视系列节目“生命”的视频中，你可以看到在刚果贝森地区拍摄到的西方低地大猩猩。

sentences.en: On the other hand, more factors can be controlled in lowland rice than in upland crops.
sentences.cn: 另一方面, 水稻比旱作物能控制更多的因素.

sentences.en: Parts of lowland Britain are also at risk.
sentences.cn: 部分英国低地也面临着同样的危险.

sentences.en: Shepherds in those hills lead a hard life compared with those who work the lowland pastures.
sentences.cn: 和那些在低地牧场上放羊人相比,山里牧羊人的生活是艰辛的.

sentences.en: The lower course of the Han Shui flows through a rich lowland.
sentences.cn: 汉江下游流过一片富庶的低地.

sentences.en: The tillage method of high - ridge platform is a effective way to harness waterlogged lowland.
sentences.cn: “高垄平台”耕法是治理低湿易涝地的有效手段.

sentences.en: Which crops do these lowland farmers use to feed their livestock?
sentences.cn: 这些住在洼地的农民使用什么农作物,来喂养他们的家畜?

words.tran_cn: 低地的人；苏格兰低地的人
